Name: Crossroad of Worlds: Mirrors to Other worlds Collector's Edition
About the game: This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes by DominiGames! You'll have to go on an exciting adventure with lots of interesting puzzles and mini-games. Investigate and find clues to solve all the mysteries. Your Uncle Rodrigue again has a very interesting case for you to solve! Usually you don't have to travel through many cities during an investigation... But not this time! You'll visit many different worlds that are inaccessible in the usual way. You'll meet lots of people and solve lots of puzzles with hidden objects! You have to do the hard work of a detective in the most different environments at the same time, solving numerous puzzles and looking for items. Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure! This Collector's Edition includes: üîç Solve the case! Quests await! You have another mystery to solve and interesting detective games to go through. The bonus part has its own story and even more exciting puzzles! üîç Earn stars! Find the differences and get stars! At each stage of the game you need to earn stars to advance to the next level and complete the investigation üîç Enjoy the quest! Challenge yourself to find all the items! Show your focus and reaction as you explore the locations and collect hidden items to complete all the interactive games. Show off your skills and save worlds.
